resources.string:
[Bluetooth Connection]

 1. Turn Bluetooth on in "Settings > Bluetooth".

 2. Turn a Bluetooth printer on, and activate Bluetooth mode.

 3. Select "Refresh" menu in "Settings > Bluetooth".

 4. After finding the printer in the list, try to connect and pair it to the device.

 5. Enter the PIN code.
 	 - Default PIN code
 	 - Bixolon device is "0000"
 	 - Sewoo device is "0000"
 	 - Woosim device is "1234"
 	 - Zebra device is "0000"

 6. Select the appopriate printer in PrintDemo.

 7. Press the "Connect" Button.

 8. Press the "Print" button to print a sample page.
Printer is busy. Please try again later.
Printer is lack of paper. Please check the cover and paper.
Print data format error. Please try again later.
Printer is broken. Please check the printer.
Printer over temperature. Please try again later.
Print is unfinished. Please try again later.
No print font library. Please try again later.
Print buffer overflow. Please try again later.
Low battery. Please charge your device.
Printer error. Please try again later.
Cover open or out of paper. Please check the cover and paper.
Printer low temperature. Please try again later.
